TEXT.TITLE: SUN <SUN> RAISES HEATING OIL BARGE PRICE
TEXT.BODY: Sun Co's Sun Refining and Marketing Co subsidiary said it raised the price it charges contract barge customers for heating oil in ny harbor by 0.50 cent a gallon, effective today. The 0.50 cent price hike brings Sun's heating oil price to 50.75 cts a gallon, the company said. Reuter
